laboratory_examinations.findings: LV ejection fraction 56%, severe mitral regurgitation, new regional wall motion abnormalities.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiogram after 1 month showed LV ejection fraction improved to 80% and only mild MR.
Improved to 39 mm Hg after revascularization.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: E-wave and pulmonary vein flow analysis
laboratory_examinations.findings: Tall E wave and blunted systolic pulmonary vein wave prior to revascularization.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: E wave decreased and pulmonary vein systolic flow restored after treatment.
